nodeList.loreText: Shine like a beacon in the darkness.
nodeList.nodeDescription: You and nearby allies passively have 30% increased damage and +60 elemental protection. Activating Holy Aura doubles the stat bonuses for 4 seconds.

nodeList.altText: {Flame Burst} deals fire damage to surrounding enemies, and is unleashed after successive melee attacks on the same enemy.
nodeList.description: If you are the one to get the final hit to unleash {Flame Burst} on an enemy, it deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: If you are the one to get the final hit on Holy Flame Burst, it deals [50%] increased damage per point.

node.description:
After an enemy takes 8 melee hits a {Flame Burst} is unleashed, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies. 

While Holy Aura is active, only 4 melee hits are required.
node.nodeDescription:
After an enemy takes 8 melee hits, there is a burst of holy fire around it.

While Holy Aura is active, only 4 melee hits are required.

node.description: Holy Aura grants you and your allies increased fire damage.
node.nodeDescription: You and your allies have [10%] increased fire damage per point.

node.description: Holy Aura grants you and your allies a chance to ignite enemies.
node.nodeDescription: Holy Aura gives +[4%] ignite chance on hit per point

node.description: Holy Aura's active duration lasts longer, but Holy Aura's cooldown lasts longer and its passive is disabled during its cooldown.
node.nodeDescription:
Holy Aura's duration is increased by 50%.

+5 second cooldown duration. Holy Aura turns off completely while on cooldown.

node.altText: {Haste} grants 30% increased movement speed. Does not stack.
node.description: Holy Aura grants you and your allies increasing throwing attack speed and a chance to gain {Haste} for 1 second on hit.
node.nodeDescription: You and your allies have [4%] increased throwing attack speed per point and a [4%] chance to gain Haste for 1 second on hit.

node.description: Holy Aura grants you and your allies increased throwing attack damage and increased stun chance with throwing attacks.
